definitions.definition: a vehicle with either two or four wheels, pulled by a horse and used for carrying goods:
a small vehicle with two or four wheels that you push or pull to transport large or heavy objects on:
a table on four small wheels with one or more shelves under it, used for serving food or drinks:
examples: Betty almost ran me over with her tea cart as I was walking into the office!

definitions.definition: to take something or someone somewhere, especially using a lot of effort:
examples: We carted all the rubbish to the bottom of the garden and burned it.
